entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: W 43 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 19.
